## Describe the bug
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

**Example:**  
_"When I try to [action], the system returns an unexpected [error/response]."_

## Steps to Reproduce
Provide the exact steps to reproduce the issue.

1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '...'
3. Scroll down to '...'
4. See the error

## Expected behavior
Describe what you expected to happen.

## Actual behavior
Explain what actually happens, including any error messages.

If applicable, add screenshots or log outputs to help explain the problem.

## Checklist
- [ ] I have searched for similar issues in both open and closed tickets.
- [ ] I have provided the necessary information above to reproduce the bug.
